description: {"blocks":[{"key":"b9tj5","text":"This electrophysiology protocol describes the electrical stimulation and measurement steps needed to localize branches and image functional activity in the cervical; vagus nerve of pigs.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
keywords: Neuromodulation, Electrical Impedance Tomography, Vagus Nerve

or PC, Matlab software ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6b9up","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2k60e","text":"Animal surgery facility, physiological readout system with End-Tidal CO2, Blood Pressure, and ECG capabilities.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8evti","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"d1993","text":"EMG status.info: We use this protocol and it’s working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"3or92","text":"Animal (pig) is anaesthetized (Isofluorane) and cervical vagus is exposed through surgery.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"akjaj","text":"Clean electrodes of the nerve cuffs by dipping into ethanol and then physiological solution (or saline solution).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5j63q","text":"Apply nerve cuffs to exposed cervical left vagus and connect to the ScouseTom system.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"dg76u","text":"Set initial parameters for selective stimulation of the pulmonary branch: suggested 50µs pulse width, 0.4mA pulse amplitude, 20Hz repetition frequency, 30s on / 30s off stimulation. Set animal ventilation setup to spontaneous breathing.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ffis3","text":"Run selective stimulation with above parameters and observe ETCO2 response to stimulation (breathing slowdown or complete block) on different electrode pairs.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1cmuk","text":" Repeat stimulation rounds with increased or decreased pulse amplitude until ETCO2 alteration is localised to one or a few stimulation pairs. Restore mechanical ventilation after completion.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8h6eh","text":"Set initial parameters for selective stimulation of the recurrent laryngeal branch: suggested 50µs pulse width, 50-100µA pulse amplitude, 20Hz repetition frequency, 5s on / 5s off stimulation. Animal can stay in mechanical ventilation during this phase.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"nd9i","text":"Run selective stimulation with above parameters and observe EMG needle response to stimulation (activation of larynx shows bursts of activity on EMG recordings) on different electrode pairs.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"32ir7","text":"Connect stimulator output of ScouseTom to bipolar cuff placed on laryngeal branch. Connect ScouseTom in EIT mode to vagus nerve EIT cuff.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7mcic","text":"Switch anaesthetic from isofluorane to α-chloralose and wait 30-40 minutes for settling.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4ejpb","text":"Set initial parameters for selective stimulation of the recurrent laryngeal branch: suggested 1ms pulse width, 1mA pulse amplitude, 20Hz repetition frequency, 30s on / 30s off stimulation. Animal can stay in mechanical ventilation during this phase.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8uhjp","text":"Run selective stimulation with above parameters and observe heart rate response to stimulation, computed in real time from peaks in blood pressure or ECG on different electrode pairs.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4bgfi","text":"Repeat stimulation rounds with increased or decreased pulse amplitude until heart rate change in response to stimulation is localised to just one or a few stimulation pairs.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"l5oc","text":"Perform spontaneous fast neural EIT with following parameters:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"67kcc","text":"- No stimulation","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1cffs","text":"- EIT: skip-5 pattern, 200 µA, 6kHz, 10 minutes each injection pair","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"f2vv9","text":"- Recording ECG, blood pressure, End-Tidal CO2 on auxiliary channels of the recording system","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"bi8oh","text":"Apply other required electrical interfaces: EMG needles on larynx, bipolar stimulation cuff on recurrent laryngeal branch (approx. 40cm from cervical vagus cuffs).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"fu3j","text":"Repeat stimulation rounds with increased or decreased pulse amplitude until EMG bursts in response to stimulation are localised to just one or a few stimulation pairs.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6pi28","text":"Perform evoked fast neural EIT according to published work with following parameters:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"tuec","text":"- EIT: skip-5 pattern, 200 µA, 6kHz, 15s each injection pair","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"edm89","text":"- Stimulation: 50 µs pulse width, 1.2 mA amplitude, 20 Hz repetition during each injection","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

title: Vagus Nerve Selective Stimulation and EIT recording
